website_summaries.verdict: A durable stainless steel rack that is oven safe and easy to clean.
pros: Made from heavy-gauge stainless steel, the dishwasher-safe rack resists rusting and warping
cons: This rack sits lower and has more widely spaced bars, so food may take longer to cool and smaller items may slip through
With only 4 feet, this rack is also less stable than others

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good rack
customer_reviews.text: My search for a good rack has been very frustrating, too many are not solid stainless or are very flimsy. This one is very nice, solid construction. Clearly all stainless, and good heavy gauge wire. The only drawbacks are slight warpage and I had to file off a few sharp edges on wire. Overall, way better than most. I would buy this again. I did NOT receive this product in exchange for my "unbiased" review! I paid full price and feel free to speak my mind!
customer_reviews.author: Paul M Stocklin

customer_reviews.title: This is the rack!  Don't look any further!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my 2 racks yesterday and they are great! Love that they are stainless steel and of high quality. I will be using mine mainly for cooking bacon in the oven, among other uses. The racks fit my jelly roll pans perfectly. I have attached a photo, because after reading the reviews and getting different answers, I still wasn't sure if the rack was even with the top of my pan, above it or below it. The rack sets about 1/4" inch below the top of my jelly roll pan. This is exactly where I wanted it to fit. The rack is very sturdy and strong. Thank you for a GREAT product!!
customer_reviews.author: lovelucy

customer_reviews.title: Best Rack & Multi-purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this once but could not be more thrilled with the results. I made bacon wrappped jalapeño poppers before but could never get the bacon crispy. But using this rack not only made it crispy but beautiful too. I cannot wait to grill and cook other items such as fried chicken etc.
customer_reviews.author: A. Young

customer_reviews.title: This is not 304 grade stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: My magnet sticks to it everywhere. So it is plated. I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and expected. These racks fit the baking sheet I used to roast our Thanksgiving turkeys. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mr. kite

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it held up well to baking, broiling and scrubbed clean with basic kitchen scrubby. It fit perfectly in my standard cookie sheet and kept my food out of the grease! No warping or bending with heat or cold water. Would reccommend for all your jalepeno popper and baked wing needs! Good product for the price. And very thoughtful customer service whom follwed up to ensure I was happy with it. Thanks! And I was NOT paid for this review.
customer_reviews.author: emilyashley315

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and heavy weight. I first used it to roast a side of salmon, and resulted in crispy skin since it was lifted up with the rack. It is also great for cooking baked goods and making guacamole (push the avocados through the rack). It fits perfectly in my sheet pans. Would buy again if/when I need a second one!
customer_reviews.author: D.Marie.D

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality A+
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality! A+ Great for cooling or heating. I have already used for cooling cupcakes...and this cooling rack won't tip over on you. Also used them to put my coated chicken wings on to finish them up...gets them up off the baking sheet and helps bake the sauce on nicely. Should last a lifetime as they are truly great quality! I am not one to take the time to do many detailed reviews but this product is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DLM MI

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several brands before choosing this rack. Fits Nordicware half sheet pan perfectly. Feels sturdy. I cooked bacon in the oven and ran the rack through the dishwasher. Came out perfectly clean and no rust so far. Will update review if I notice any rust or other problems. Only thing I noticed is the measurements aren't *exactly* correct. Still not a problem as I said, it fits my half sheet pan perfectly. I want to buy another as soon as it's back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to bake chicken in the oven. It did an awesome job. I coat chicken tenderloins in cornstarch, dip them in egg and milk mixture. Then roll them in panko crumbs and place them on the rack. Since we are on a low sodium diet, I only use Mrs Dash, pepper and paprika for seasoning. Takes about 40 minutes at 350 to bake. They come out very crispy, like fried chicken but no fat or high sodium. I found a low sodium bbq sauce that we can dip them in. Or I cut them up and put the pieces in a salad. No need for an air fryer. Don't have room for one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very, very time consuming to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I cooked bacon on this rack and it was almost impossible to clean. With all the individual squared it takes 15 minutes just to get to all the food stuck on the rack. Simply not worth all the work to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: ltlhoot

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use as a cooling rack and to bake some bacon and chicken in the oven. Works great for cooling! Works just as great for baking without having your food soak in its own grease and fat! Only down-side is cleaning it completely. It is tough to get in each groove when something was cooked on it, sometimes resulting in left-over residue being stuck to it. A little extra elbow grease works to get it off, it just takes a little while and maybe a couple washes :)
customer_reviews.author: Aziz & Giana

customer_reviews.title: Love this rack!
customer_reviews.text: I fought the battle for converting from round baking racks to one large one. I am able to cook larger cookies because there is so much more space with this rack. The rack is study, cleans wells and looks like quality. It it not a cheap looking cooling rack. Another advantage is that it's easier to keep up with one large rack than remembering when I stored smaller round one. This was definitely a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick1177

customer_reviews.title: great product -- but even greater customer service!...
customer_reviews.text: these racks are perfect in any baking role - in the oven crisping bacon, baking pork loins or cooling cakes, cookies, etc...a little smaller than 1/2 sheet pan but fits round cakes perfectly...just ordered the "big sister" of these two to fit the full 1/2 sheet baking pan...had to contact the seller about an error I made & he responded immediately & resolved the matter 100% to my benefit...highly recommend doing business with Spring Chef!...customer satisfaction are not just words --- clearly for Spring Chef this is the company's mission...& they achieved it in spades!....thanks again Brian!...looking forward to doing more business with Spring Chef...
customer_reviews.author: clapton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, many uses, made well
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this rack. It's exactly what I was looking for. I wanted something with a grid that fit inside a sheet pan. This is a perfect fit. I use it to coat called, cookies, candies, fruit in chocolate, icing, and/or glaze. All the meds stays in the pan and the rack lifts it off the bottom with just the right amount of height. I will also use it in the oven to bake bacon. Very happy with it, will buy again and will definitely recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: The various sizes, criss-cross design and being stainless steel sold me on these versatile racks!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these racks in different sizes and like them better than others because of their criss-cross design and they're stainless steel. The design keeps food from falling through when used for baking and broiling, and being stainless steel, they're sturdy and easy to clean, either by hand or in a dishwasher. Also the sizes offered fit perfectly into my baking sheets and jelly roll pans. Of course they're also great as cooling racks, standing about an inch from the surface they're on. I expect they'll last for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kj1011

customer_reviews.title: No sticking... oven fried Chicken great
customer_reviews.text: No sticking my oven fried chicken came out great and I like when my food comes out perfect let's air get to the chicken great product even better when I have to use no oil to fry watching my health.👍
customer_reviews.author: fefe

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I seen a commercial for the Copper ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I seen a commercial for the Copper Chrisper and then figured I could get a baking rack to get my baking sheet, because the Gotham and Copper crispers are pretty small. I would recommend doing this over getting a Gotham or Copper Crispers. Just measure your existing baking sheet and order a rack that will fit it. I cook on this thing all the Time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this rack...
customer_reviews.text: Really have gotten my money's worth. I use it often and it is always ready to go. It stores above the refrigerator with the rest of the trays etc in vertical storage. It is not the least bit flimsy and always sits on the counter, level and stays in place. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Beth

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for my roasting pan that I use for prime ribs. It had a rack to keep the roast off the bottom, but it was flimsy and sagged with a heavy roast. I'm very pleased with the quality of this rack. It is very sturdy and does an excellent job of keeping the roast off the bottom of pan. It is stainless steel and cleans up well. I'm very pleased and highly recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: John in Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, true stainless!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use this at least once a week for homemade wings or veggies. This makes the wings so much crispier than just laying flat on a baking sheet, and super easy to clean by popping in the dishwasher! I actually learned about the "magnet test" by some reviews on other baking racks, and after trying it myself I can confirm this product is true stainless. No warping or issues, I expect this will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Mabel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooling rack for a very large baking project I was doing and it did not disappoint! It is sturdy and seems to be very well made, and was not difficult to clean. I compare it to one I purchased from Target not that long ago and I think this one is going to stand the test of time far better. The other one is already warping (metal is too soft I think), while this one kept its shape perfectly. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: I have only been able to use this once but the seller keeps sending emails asking me (very politely) to provide feedback. I wanted to wait till I used this a few months, but... from the one use, it worked fine --no warping so far, and it went into the dishwasher and cleaned up nicely. My husband used it to put sweet potato fries into the oven. I didn't find they were any crisper than when we cook them on a cookie sheet with foil. Will be using the rack in the future for chicken tenders and larger pieces.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jay

customer_reviews.title: Large and heavy-duty, what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These are a heavier gauge steel and appear to be well-constructed. The pdf file that came from Spring Chef indicates they can be used in the oven also, and can safely go in the dishwasher. They are made in China, so will have to wait and see if they remain rust-free and hold up to use, since my prior experiences with Chinese "stainless steel" have invariably failed in regards to these issues, but from my initial observations, they're some of the best cooling racks I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy P.

customer_reviews.title: with a little help - PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: Dear Sir / Madam: I purchased your 12" x 8.5" Stainless Steel Baking Rack to use in a small Oster Toaster/Roaster Oven. The 12" dimension was just a hair too lengthy. By the gentle use of a 12" Channel-Lock Pliers I convinced your rack to become a 11.75" x 8.5" rack. Your rack is so very strong and tough none of the welds popped. It now fits perfectly in the oven. Thank you for such quality Stainless Steel construction. Sincerely, Ronald Kircher
customer_reviews.author: Ronald K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly suited for large roasting usage
customer_reviews.text: I bought an extra large covered roasting pan and needed a rack to keep the two ducks I was planning to cook above the bottom. This rack was the perfect size to fit. After cooking, which is a messy process, the rack was easy to clean. Shipping was very efficient and the seller was very prompt in following up to make sure I was happy with my purchase. Here's the link to the Roaster that I bought. Suggest combining these two items together. Columbian Home Prod. 0511-1 Covered Rectangle Roaster
customer_reviews.author: MeWIT

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I got this to fit a half sheet pan we had to bake bacon and chicken wings. It’s absolutely one of the best purchases for us this year. My husband likes to try different flavors on chicken wings and the rack is perfect for keeping the wings out of the drippings. We used foil in the past and while they were good, the rack is the way to go. It fits our pan exactly and it washes up perfectly in the dishwasher too!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P

customer_reviews.title: Brush with oil before cooking
customer_reviews.text: We broil a lot of fish and chicken, though it makes our oven pans nasty and clean up is a chore. We are trying to avoid cooking food on aluminum foil, so I got this Spring Chef grill. We've used it several times and it has worked beautifully, even giving the meat a slight grilled effect. It helps with cleanup if you brush some oil on it before using and then soak it in soapy water and scrub with a sponge. Great purchase, would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick V. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: For some reason (and this is my own fault) I thought I was getting TWO cooling racks. I guess it was because of the price. $14 for one small-ish cooling rack is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fish

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T KNOW ABOUT A COOLING RACK... NOW I KNOW!
customer_reviews.text: For years was just using paper towel to strain grease from food, etc. Now I know about a cooling rack. The best thing about Spring Chef Cooling Rack is the fact that it came 2 and it is the perfect size when you don't need a large rack. Love it and I am sooo glad I found out about a 'cooling rack'!
customer_reviews.author: JeMicheSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great to use on quartz countertops
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these stainless steel baking and cooling racks basically to place hot pots on top of them then over our quartz countertop. I didn't know that quartz counters are not really heat resistant. The resin used to bind the raw materials can discolor if a hot pot is placed directly on top of quartz. These racks prevent them from happening.
customer_reviews.author: GigifromVenice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rack!
customer_reviews.text: Spent a bit of time researching via reviews the best rack and this is the one!! Have used it a half dozen times so far, in the oven making bacon, staging kebabs and cooling baked goods. Edges are smooth and it's been subjected to rapid temp changes from hot to cool with no warping. Get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Yount

customer_reviews.title: We Use These for Jerky - Love them!
customer_reviews.text: We make turkey and beef jerky in the oven. Other cooling racks were not "cross-hatched" like these and the meat fell through. These racks are perfect. They support the meat and we get delicious jerky. Naturally, they would work as cooling racks for other uses. We run the racks through the dish washer and they come out clean with no signs of damage to the metal.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Best uncoated rack for oven baking and broiling.
customer_reviews.text: I love this rack!! It has a very low level stand and sits really easily and safely on a baking sheet. I had been searching for a non coated baking rack for months! My husband loves to cook his bacon and bangers (sausages) at the weekends and my last rack was so old and rusted I had to throw it away. This rack is perfect and cleans up really easily. Weekend brunch has now been saved. Thank you. Now my son wants one for his broiling needs at college !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Peppa

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Missing one of the legs so when placed on the counter it tilts. Hoping to get a new one that isn’t broken. Besides that I was looking forward to using this item
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for roasting meats
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite kitchen tools. Great for roasting meats. Of course be sure to get a nice cookie sheet as a drip pan. Easy to clean; just soak immediately after use and use a vegetable brush to get crumbs and bits out of the cross sections. Dry with a paper towel before putting away for storage.
customer_reviews.author: tla

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cook a lot, and also own quite a few different racks. This has become my go to, and is used just about every day. It's very well made, and so much larger than what I usually see for sale. The squares are very small, so you don't have to worry about your cookies sinking.
customer_reviews.author: Autm88

customer_reviews.title: High quality stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: We use this to bake frozen French fries. No more burned or sticking to the pan. It fits our cookie pan perfectly. Made from actual stainless steel, not a coating.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Newman

customer_reviews.title: Should wipe after each use to avoid rusting.
customer_reviews.text: This rack started to rush after using it for 2 times. Like all racks, it is hard to wash between the cracks and connections.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky Woo

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: I got it and I use it and it works great. I will probably be purchasing several more soon. I have found it easier to clean than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: azhirise

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this baking rack for use in the oven as opposed to using as a cooling rack. I read that racks with non stick coatings should not be used in the oven for temps above 400 and I need to roast vegies and chicken at 425 or 450, so I got this non coated rack. It works but it is hard to clean within the crosshatching fyi.
customer_reviews.author: YankeeFan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to bake chicken wings and also used this as a cooking rack and it works great. The wings were high enough from the bottom of the roasting pan to have air flow underneath. I soaked it in the kitchen sink for a few minutes to loosen baked on chicken and then put it in the dishwasher. I wish I had purchased this product years ago!
customer_reviews.author: K. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: An excellent baking rack, it fits nicely in a 1/2 sheet-pan. The rack seems to be high quality and because it's stainless steel, the finish can't scratch or wear off the way so many non-stick coatings do. Also, food doesn't stick. I always wipe a little oil on it with a paper towel, and that prevents any sticking. Great product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Max L. Woolslayer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly. Great size and weight. I took the backbone off a 14 lb turkey and cut the breast bone in half. I put both halves of the turkey on the rack which was sitting in a cookie sheet. The rack held the weight and the turkey came out perfect. It will be great for oven fried chicken, and a multitude of other things. The rack allows heat to circulate up under what you are cooking so it will be great for potatoes and other veges too. Great price for all you can do!
customer_reviews.author: S.K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I prefer bacon baked in the oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I prefer bacon baked in the oven. I just sprayed a little olive oil on this baking rack, placed the bacon on it, and it cooked evenly. Bacon came right off, and the rack is very easy to clean. I purchased this to replace an old rack I had been fighting with--so glad I did. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: alixer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It's too small for anything I could use it for. Will flip if you have more than one thing on it that weighs different.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product, as wanted something to hold up. We make a lot of dog cookies and human ones as well, but the racks I have are very old and literally the welding came apart. As we already own the baking sheet which is also outstanding so help me I was not paid to say this, these products are HIGH QUALITY!!! You will never need to replace.. they are stainless steel high end btw, and the racks are dishwasher safe. Can u ask for more? I will not use any other brand after owning these new racks and the bkg sheet!!! Wish I knew about this company sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, does it well!
customer_reviews.text: Being at home during the covid days, baking has increased. The need for additional drying space, and raised baking caused a quick search on Amazon. Low and behold a perfect match, with a perfect fit! Durable, sturdy, easy to clean, and no fuss. Should have bought these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Alexander

customer_reviews.title: The baking rack looks nice and durable
customer_reviews.text: Most of my local stores only carry cooling rack/baking rack in chrome/nonstick/ aluminum, I'm looking for a stainless steel to go with my stainless steel baking pan. I should have bought the smaller size but I've decided to go with the 12x17 just in case I need to use on my other pans. The baking rack looks nice and durable. I have been using only once to bake french fries and its working fine, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Last_Avenger

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for stainless steel rack for cooking and I was happy to find. Worked great and also cleans very easily in dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Best baking racks I can find!
customer_reviews.text: These perfectly fit my half-sheet baking pans. They appear to be good quality stainless steel and well made. I expect they will last a long time. One thing to consider, and it is not a negative: they do not stack well on top of each other, so if you need that style choose another. Otherwise, these are the best out there that I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling Archer

customer_reviews.title: What a tool
customer_reviews.text: Was using multiple baking racks in our pans for cooking bacon, roasting vegetables and potatos. Had a larger one I took and modified for a smoker. To replace that i discovered the Spring Chef Rack. It is the exact fit for the new baking pans, made great and now is part of my favorite kitchen items.
customer_reviews.author: DHuts

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up beautifully with no effort.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to clean, no matter what is stuck on it. The dishwasher makes it look beautiful again. It fits well in my older 10 x 15 pans, but not in my new Circulon pan. However, it fits well enough to use if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling rack
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it for cooling bread as well as baking in the oven, (it fits perfectly in the pan I bought it for). Received It early. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sabean

customer_reviews.title: good solid and sturdy rack
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace one of my racks and wanted one that would not rust. I think this will be a keeper!! Very sturdy and have used it about 8 times already for muffins, cookies, cupcakes and it is doing really well!
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Fan Tudie

customer_reviews.title: All my questions answered after I received the rack.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous ordering it, because the description didn't say you could broil with it. When I received it the label did say you could broil with it also. It's very well made. Tomorrow I will use it as a cooling rack fro my homemade bread. Then soon I will be indirect roasting a pork shoulder on the grill with it. I will post the results soon.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Darbyshire

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these to eveyone
customer_reviews.text: These are the cooling racks I have been waiting for!! They are heavy duty stainless steel, not the cheap aluminum ones that rust. I used them last night to bake my granddaughter's birthday cake. They have feet that are big enough to allow air flow underneath and a grid that keeps cookies and smaller baked goods from falling through. I would recommend these to eveyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooking rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice rack for the price. Bought to put inside a large cookie sheet pan to cook a whole chicken and other meats. Worked perfectly and was able to clean in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Dlaney

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: I don't bake. I bought this rack to use on my grill for fish, shrimp, and veg that might fall through the grill grates. It works great for me and I love that it is stainless steel. It won't rust and can go into the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: MarPlum

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in a cookie sheet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they fit perfectly in a cookie sheet. I use them to cook bacon perfectly in the oven and then it goes in the dishwasher and comes out nice and clean. Saves me a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Nana4

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack
customer_reviews.text: I have always heard the best way to cook bacon is in the oven but I could never find a rack that worked well. This is my answer. Easy to clean. Fits in my baking pan perfectly. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. This rack fits in my baking pan perfectly and cleans up easy in the dishwasher. I’ve seen no sign of rust after a few months and would purchase again if I decide to get more.
customer_reviews.author: Goodneighbor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a rack from Walmart that isn’t stainless steel but it was a third of the cost. I use these to oven bake bacon. This rack always comes out clean and all the food comes off. The Walmart rack does not. This is a quality baking rack
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fits on a large jelly-roll pan for roasting poultry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed something very large for a spatchcocked turkey at Thanksgiving. It fits in the size of my oven perfectly - turkey was about 16 lb and I believe I got the 12 by 17 inch rack I used to roast it on.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Net

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed--hit all the right marks
customer_reviews.text: We used the rack to cook chicken wings in the oven and it was perfect for what we needed. It fit perfectly in our baking sheet so it caught all the drippings from the wings; it was sturdy and well proportioned; it was easy to clean; and we're very happy with the fact that it doesn't use coatings and that it looks like it will stay rust-free. My fiancee selected this rack over others because she cares about all of these things as much as the maker of the product does, so I'm glad there are companies out there who are attentive to attributes that are important to her and us.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping my laptop cool
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy this for cooking, but nice product if I had. Bought this to keep my laptop cool while on a glass surface. PERFECT for that purpose and I am ready for any late night cookie cravings too.
customer_reviews.author: Texas JR

customer_reviews.title: Love these racks.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to use with our aluminum half sheet cooking pans, they fit perfectly. We use them primarily for cooking bacon in the oven so the grease drips down onto the pan and away from the bacon.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdave65

customer_reviews.title: Great quality backing rack!  Makes crispy chicken wings too!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband to try a new method for cooking hot wings in the oven. I think he needs to work on his technique a bit; but overall the chicken wings were very good and this rack helped them become crispier (as the technique intended). To clean it, I suggest soaking it with dishwashing liquid, then using a scrub brush to remove anything that's stuck to it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: It got put straight to work making bacon for a New Years morning crowd at our house. Washed up like a dream, fit exactly in my pan to hold the bacon above the grease. Nice quality, wonderful buying experience. SPOILER ALERT: If you are getting one to fit inside a pan, actually get out the measuring tape and CHECK the inside measurements, being mindful of where the feet will rest; some racks have the "feet" out at the edge which wouldn't work for my cookie sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Anders

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare to clean by hand but works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cook bacon in the oven, so it doesn't sit in it's own grease. It works great for this purpose but since I don't have a dishwasher it's a real pain to clean by hand.
customer_reviews.author: OmniPhillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 4 Cornish game hens
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled to have found this size for my roasting pan. It is not high, but it accommodated 4 Cornish game hens perfectly. It cleans easily too.
customer_reviews.author: TweedleDee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: The rack was the one we ordered and it was delivered promptly. It survived its first two trips through the dishwasher. I won't know the true quality of the item for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F.

customer_reviews.title: Coating failure
customer_reviews.text: The grid racking worked great and I still use it, however the coating on the pan started failing after a few uses. Definitely not going to be using it anymore with the coating flaking off in food.
customer_reviews.author: Alric Rand

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and very sturdy. I needed some for Super Bowl and these definitely fit the bill. Super easy to clean very happy with my purchase and they came really fast
customer_reviews.author: Kathy V.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in a baking sheet I bought from Pampered Chef. I bought it primarily to cook bacon in the oven. It works great. A little bit of a pain to clean. I usually soak it in hot water, give it a good scrubbing, and then toss it in the dishwasher for good measure. It hasn't gotten rusty or warped.
customer_reviews.author: JEANNE S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Would buy again...
customer_reviews.text: So far, this item appears to be an excellent value. It definitely feels more heavy-duty than my wife's baking racks (which she uses to cool cookies and would not let me use in the oven for my culinary exploits). So far, I have cooked bacon in the oven on it and made crispy oven-baked chicken wings. In both instances, the rack performed well. It fits perfectly into a half-size sheet pan. The only downside is that it can be tedious to clean off the bits of baked-on things from inside the "grid". This is the nature of using these types of racks in the oven, however. It is not something that is inherent with just this particular rack.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G

customer_reviews.title: defective
customer_reviews.text: I never got to use it. The bottom foot part was fused and when I tried to open and it broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Osiris Brantley

customer_reviews.title: I use this rack for draining the whey from the ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this rack for draining the whey from the cheese I make and not baking. Although I'm not sure I'd call it "heavy duty" (it's uses the same gauge wire as my other baking racks) it is well constructed and doesn't sag under the weight of 2-3# wheels of cheese. Additionally, because it's stainless it doesn't react to the mildly acidic whey.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I received my oven rack and am very pleased with the solid stainless steel construction and quality of workmanship. Because it is so versatile, going from counter to oven to grill, it will be used a lot in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Horses Rule!

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again if ever need to.
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooking in oven. And slim design it isn't too tall fit in cooking pan sheets nicely it does slide a little but not much with the correct sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Marie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and described. I've used it twice already and I love it for roasting chicken pieces or cooking bacon in the oven or as a cooking rack when baking.
customer_reviews.author: ASkal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome baking rack!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oven rack for a recipe that requires baking bacon on a rack in the oven. The rack fits perfectly in a half sheet pan. I made my maple bacon today using the rack. It held up perfectly in the oven. When I removed it from the oven it helps its shape, no warping, extremely durable and amazingly easy to clean. I filled the 1/2 sheet pan with soapy water and let the rack soak for 15 minutes. Using a sponge, the rack came clean with little effort. I strongly recommend this product. I plan on checking out some of their other products in case I must have something else they manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Sadberry

customer_reviews.title: Good bacon=oven rack bacon
customer_reviews.text: This is great for cook ik ng great non greasy bacon in the oven. I know it can be used for more but I've really only used it for bacon. Oh, and to cook crispy tofu without flipping, fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been a great rack. I bought the rack because Remmington James recommended it on his youtube channel and uses it alot for the meal prep videos.
customer_reviews.author: TEsp8

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I bought the rack to bake bacon. The rack is sturdy. The welds are perfect. The rack stays flat and doesn't twist in the oven. The size fits perfectly in my dishwasher. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than the food service supply warehouses had and very versatile. Fits in my half sheet pan and ceans up quickly with a stiff brush! great buy
customer_reviews.author: Deb E.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This product works great as a cooling rack and also have used it in the oven, baking and broiling as well. Has held up very nicely with no warping so far.
customer_reviews.author: Garland

customer_reviews.title: I don't consider it heavy duty but it works
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it was slightly heavier. It doesn't feel like heavy duty. Those two words should be removed from the description. Otherwise it is fine and serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Mark

customer_reviews.title: For more than just cookies
customer_reviews.text: I don't really bake a lot or make cookies or whatever. I used this to get things crispy without deep frying. Last night I used it for "fried" chicken. I position it over a deep baking dish and it gets golden brown on all sides without flipping. Much better than gummy, soggy breading. I also use it for baking chicken thighs so all the fat drips off. It's a good price and you'll use it more than you think.
customer_reviews.author: KSO

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I baked bacon-wrapped chicken thighs and the racks worked perfectly! I needed the bacon fat well drained as the thighs cooked and the racks performed as I hoped they would. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: JustME

customer_reviews.title: Bomb digity rack
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for frying chicken wings in the oven and hundreds of other uses. Grease just falls right off when washing, dish washer safe, hands down good product.
customer_reviews.author: Randi West

customer_reviews.title: what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: I've looked a while to find a rack I can use in my oven. This is a very nice rack and will meet my needs perfectly. It's very light in weight. I haven't been able to use it yet, but, when I do I'm sure it will help to make things easier for me in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: C.C. from Oregon

customer_reviews.title: A nice size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift it is a nice size. cookie sheet sits on it good. As little feet to raise it off the counter for air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rack
customer_reviews.text: Fits inside our rimmed baking sheet and is oven safe so very useful for baking goods. Of course it also works great as a cooling sheet as well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The perfect rack!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and made well! Some stainless baking racks are too thick and not very good for the oven, but this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Maluhia

customer_reviews.title: It works. And that's what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now - LOVE IT. Fits perfectly into the half sheet pans recommended by Cooks Illustrated. I've cooked roasts on this, I cook bacon on it in the oven all the time. Just rinse the big chunks off and throw it in the dishwasher. Comes out looking brand new. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Calligen Nox

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel,
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of the cooling rack to replace old racks. Seem to be able to hold my future cookies batches. Like that they are stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: True single

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy !
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what i was hoping for. I held up reviewing till i used it and cleaned it a few times and i am happy to say it did both quite well. I have purchased a few other brands of these that i ended up throwing away because you needed a blow torch to clean them. This one washed up very easily and i will be purchasing another larger one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooling Rack
customer_reviews.text: We sent this cooling rack to our daughter for Christmas. She has since used it when baking cookies and mentioned that it is very well made and a good size for cooling a batch of cookies.
customer_reviews.author: KRH

customer_reviews.title: Goid racks
customer_reviews.text: These 10x15 racks are nice and are great for cooling cookies or for baking meats that you want to raise from the bottom of a pan allowing for quicker convection heating.
customer_reviews.author: VitaTTop Contributor: Sunglasses

product_meta.title: Spring Chef Cooling Rack - Baking Rack - Heavy Duty, 100% Stainless Steel, Oven Safe, 12 x 17 Inches Fits Half Sheet Cookie Pan
feature_bullets: Customers Love It: "My results were amazing. This rack had zero issues holding up my barbecue meat ... The quality materials, expert craftsmanship and durability make this an essential item in my kitchen" - Kelly Y
100% Solid 18/8 Stainless Steel Construction - NO metal platings or coatings that can chip or scratch and transfer toxins/chemicals to your food

Broil, Bake, Roast, Decorate or Cool with this versatile 12" x 17" rack. Try it for making crispy chicken in the oven, allowing grease to drip after frying foods, making baked potatoes, decorating cakes and more

Engineered for supreme durability and rust/warp-resistance with Heavy Gauge Steel. Grid size and 4 raised feet were specifically designed to allow optimal air circulation. Rack fits perfectly in 13 x 18 inches Half Sheet Baking Pan (as shown in image - pan not included)
Oven Safe, Dishwasher safe and backed by a LIFETIME Warranty
